name: Fleeing From Evil
description:
Survival Horror game inspired in resident evil 2 remake.

Sinopse:

After a zombie apocalypse Sarah got stuck where he works, now his only options are dying there or try get out of there alive!

How To Play:

WASD - Movement

Left Click -  Shoot

Right Click -  Aiming

Shift - Sprint

Space - Aiming lock

E - interact

Tab -  invetory

ESC -  pause
